title: Bungou Stray Dogs 3rd Season
synopsis: Following the conclusion of the three-way organizational war, government bureaucrat Ango Sakaguchi recalls an event that transpired years ago, after the death of the former Port Mafia boss. Osamu Dazai, still a new recruit at the time, was tasked with investigating rumors related to a mysterious explosion that decimated part of the city years agoâ€”and its connection to the alleged reappearance of the former boss.
